contentrichtext.text: {{Merge-school|date=March 2009}} {{Infobox Education in Canada |name= Queen Victoria Annex<ref>"For School Data, Source: [http://www.bced.gov.bc.ca/schoolbook/ BC Schools Book]." ''Province of British Columbia, Ministry of Education'' January 16, 2006.</ref> |image= |imagesize= |motto= |motto_translation= |streetaddress= 1850 3rd Ave E |city= [[Vancouver, British Columbia|Vancouver]] |province= [[British Columbia]] |postalcode= V5N 1H2 |areacode= 604 |phone= 713-4694 |fax= 713-4734 |email= |url= |schoolnumber= 3939107 |schoolboard= [[School District 39 Vancouver]] |superintendent= |trustee= |affiliation= |principal= Jonathan Weresch |viceprincipal= |administrator= |staff= |fundingtype= [[Public school (government funded)|Public]] |schooltype= [[Elementary school]] |grades= K-5 |language= |area= |mascot= |teamname= |colours= |founded= |enrollment= 151 |enrollment_as_of= September 19th, 2011 }} '''Queen Victoria Annex''' is a public [[elementary school]] in [[Vancouver, British Columbia]] part of [[School District 39 Vancouver]]. == History == Registration for the 2013 school year is open as of November 1st 2012, 9am to 3pm. See guidelines: ref 2. == Programs == {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} == Activities == {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} ==See also== *[[Monarchy in British Columbia#Education|Monarchy in British Columbia]] == References == *<ref>http://www.vsb.bc.ca/school-registration</ref> {{reflist}} ==External links== ===School Reports - Ministry of Education=== * [http://www.bced.gov.bc.ca/reports/pdfs/class_size/03939107.pdf Class Size] * [http://www.bced.gov.bc.ca/reports/pdfs/sat_survey/2005/03939107.pdf Satisfaction Survey] * [http://www.bced.gov.bc.ca/reports/pdfs/school_perf/03939107.pdf School Performance] * [http://www.bced.gov.bc.ca/reports/pdfs/fsa/03939107.pdf Skills Assessment] {{VancouverSchools}} {{coord missing|British Columbia}} [[Category:Elementary schools in Vancouver]] {{Vancouver-school-stub}}
